body_html: @gustavla agreed, but due to a (temporary) shortage of resources in our Jenkins test cluster (ironic, we are Google :-)), we prefer to not auto-trigger tests or allow contributors to do so. You can certainly run unit tests locally, which I presume you do. @caisq or @martinwicke can the buildifier tests be run standalone?

body: @gustavla agreed, but due to a (temporary) shortage of resources in our Jenkins test cluster (ironic, we are Google :-)), we prefer to not auto-trigger tests or allow contributors to do so. You can certainly run unit tests locally, which I presume you do.  @caisq or @martinwicke can the buildifier tests be run standalone?
